content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the vilnius city district court the court decided to dissolve a marriage and divide the movable and immovable properties between the parties the defendant had to pay a total of €53003 which included various fees the court awarded both the applicant and the defendant half ownership of a vehicle and divided a garage equally between them the text also explains different aspects of property rights in a marriage such as joint matrimonial property and personal property the applicant sought various outcomes including the dissolution of the marriage division of property and the payment of costs by the defendant the court allowed the action to proceed in the absence of the defendant and considered the interests of the minor children and the financial situation of the parties the court divided the garage equally and recognized the applicants ownership of certain assets the court also ordered the defendant to pay the applicants costs the court upheld the action and dissolved the marriage the claimant will keep their current surname while the respondent will keep their married surname the court assigned ownership of specific properties to each party and ordered the defendant to pay various costs
